mi:PackageInformation.name: Orckestra.Media.StaticFileLinkMediaProvider
mi:PackageInformation.author: Orckestra
mi:PackageInformation.TechnicalDetails: This is a (read only) media provider that show up in the media structure, exposing files from website and allowing console users to link directly to static files.
mi:PackageInformation.Description: This is a (read only) media provider that show up in the media structure, exposing files from website and allowing console users to link directly to static files.
